data.title: How much do Pentair Flow Technologies employees make?
data.meta_description: The average annual salary of Pentair Flow Technologies is estimated to be approximate $101,176 per year. The majority pay is between $89,070 to $114,269 per year. Visit Salary.com to find out Pentair Flow Technologies salary, Pentair Flow Technologies pay rate, and more.
data.text:
1. How much does Pentair Flow Technologies in the United States pay?

Pentair Flow Technologies pays its employees an average of $101,176 per year. The average salary at Pentair Flow Technologies range from $89,070 to $114,269 per year.

2. Do Pentair Flow Technologies employees get a higher salary than other similar companies?

The salary at Pentair Flow Technologies is lesser than BD Injection Systems. The highest salary package reported for an employee at Pentair Flow Technologies is $114,269 per year, meanwhile the highest salary package reported for an employee at BD Injection Systems is $119,671 per year.
